menu_missing_rmm_prompt_desc: Your installation of RadialMouseMenu is either missing or installed incorrectly! Please visit the mod page for more information: https://modworkshop.net/mod/27225
menu_missing_dependencies_prompt_desc:
Without these mods, you will crash when attempting to use the Ping Menu. It is recommended to disable Ping Menu if you do not intend to install these dependencies.
-You are missing the following dependencies:
menu_dependency_radialmousemenu_desc: Used for creating the ping menu.
menu_dependency_holdthekey_desc: Used for detecting user input for the ping menu.
menu_pingwaypoint_debug_desc: If true, writes debug data to Console/BLT log
menu_pingwaypoint_keybind_ping_desc: Bind the key to create pings here
menu_pingwaypoint_max_pings_per_player_d:
Max number of pings before deleting old pings. Rounded up.
Set to 0 for no limit.
pingmenu_usevoice_desc: Play appropriate voice lines when pinging
pingmenu_usechat_desc: Auto-say appropriate chat messages when pinging
pingmenu_useanim_desc: Plays appropriate hand animation when pinging
pingmenu_keybehavior_desc: Choose how to select items from the menu
